CustomField.description: This field is used to categorize opportunities for the transfer to the financial forecasting model.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Assessment/POC"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Thomson Elite"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Bridgeway - New"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Direct - Other"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "OEM - Other"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "MDY"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Micromenders"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Reseller - Other"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - New Converted Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recovered Product")), "New Sale", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Add-on module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Additional Services"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Consulting Services"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Bridgeway - Upgrade"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - License Band Uplift"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - User Count Uplift"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Recurring Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Price Increase"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Version License"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Services Change Request"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Services Change Request Internal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "License Conversion - Recurring Increase")), "Installed Base Sale", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Renewal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Other - Renewal")), "Renewal", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Downgrade - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Paused - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Paused - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Restarted - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Restarted - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Paused"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Billing Restarted"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Quota Credit Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Unsuccessful Sales Conversion - Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Module"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Unsuccessful Trial - Product Downgrade"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - Recurring Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - User Count Decrease"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "License Conversion - Recurring Decrease"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Practice Credit Adjustment"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Cancellation - CPI")), "Accounting Only", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Acquired New Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Acquired New Product"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Legal - Acquired Add-on Module")), "Acquired Contract", "Error?")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to categorize opportunities for the transfer to the financial forecasting model.
CustomField.label: Simple Type
